pageContext.claim: “The Cyber Hack is far greater in the Fake News Media than in actuality. I have been fully briefed and everything is well under control. Russia, Russia, Russia is the priority chant when anything happens because Lamestream is, for mostly financial reasons, petrified of.....discussing the possibility that it may be China (it may!).”
pageContext.analysis: Trump, always eager to excuse Russia, tried to blame China for a massive cyber attack that struck many government institutions. There was little evidence that was the case . On Jan. 5, a joint statement issued by the FBI, Department of Homeland Security and Director of National Intelligence and National Security Agency characterized the hacking campaign as "likely Russian in origin."
